mapper.sql: id, parent_id, cid,cz_id, xid, sid,qdid, ofXianDuan,typeid, line,left_right,xingbie, zongHe_id,type,quDuanSheJi_name, quDuanYunYing_name, quDuan_length, carrier, diDuan_type, xianLuQingKuang, bianJie, fenJieDian_where, zhanQuFenJie, jinZhanXinHaoJi_name, xinHaoJiOrBiaoZhiMing, xinHaoBiaoZhiPai_where, xinHaoJi_where, zuoCeJueYuan_type, youCeJueYuan_type, zhengXianHouFangQuDuan_ID, zhengXianQianFangQuDuan_ID, daoChaGuanLianQuDuan1_ID, daoChaGuanLianQuDuan2_ID, dianMaHuaGuiHao, guiNeiDiZhi, yuliu
mapper.select: SELECT quDuanYunYing_name FROM mro_quduan_base WHERE cz_id = #{stationId} AND qdid = #{sectionId}

SELECT
FROM mro_quduan_base WHERE cid = #{cid} AND line = '电码化'

SELECT qb.*, dwd.dwd_name, xd.xd_name, cz.cz_name FROM mro_xianduan xd, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_chezhan cz, mro_quduan_base qb WHERE xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND cz.cid = qb.cid AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND line = '电码化' AND cz.cid = #{cid}

SELECT qb.*, xd.xd_name, dwd.dwd_name, cz.cz_name FROM mro_xianduan xd, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_chezhan cz, mro_quduan_base qb WHERE xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND cz.cid = qb.cid AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND line = '电码化' AND xd.xid = #{xid}

SELECT qb.*, xd.xd_name, dwd.dwd_name, cz.cz_name FROM mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz, mro_quduan_base qb WHERE dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND cz.cid = qb.cid AND line = '电码化' AND did = #{did}

SELECT qb.*, xd.xd_name, dwd.dwd_name, cz.cz_name FROM mro_tieluju tlj, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz, mro_quduan_base qb WHERE tlj.tid = dwd.tlj_dwd_id AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND cz.cid = qb.cid AND line = '电码化' AND tid = #{tid}

SELECT qb.*, dwd.dwd_name, xd.xd_name, cz.cz_name FROM mro_xianduan xd, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_chezhan cz, mro_quduan_base qb WHERE xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND cz.cid = qb.cid AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND line != '电码化' AND cz.cid = #{cid}

SELECT qb.*, xd.xd_name, dwd.dwd_name, cz.cz_name FROM mro_xianduan xd, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_chezhan cz, mro_quduan_base qb WHERE xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND cz.cid = qb.cid AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND line != '电码化' AND xd.xid = #{xid}

SELECT qb.*, xd.xd_name, dwd.dwd_name, cz.cz_name FROM mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz, mro_quduan_base qb WHERE dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND cz.cid = qb.cid AND line != '电码化' AND did = #{did}

SELECT qb.*, xd.xd_name, dwd.dwd_name, cz.cz_name FROM mro_tieluju tlj, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz, mro_quduan_base qb WHERE tlj.tid = dwd.tlj_dwd_id AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND cz.cid = qb.cid AND line != '电码化' AND tid = #{tid}

mapper.insert: insert into mro_quduan_base (id, parent_id, cid, xid, sid, typeid, line_id, zongHe_id, quDuanSheJi_name, quDuanYunYing_name, quDuan_length, carrier, diDuan_type, xianLuQingKuang, bianJie, fenJieDian_where, zhanQuFenJie, jinZhanXinHaoJi_name, xinHaoJiOrBiaoZhiMing, xinHaoBiaoZhiPai_where, xinHaoJi_where, zuoCeJueYuan_type, youCeJueYuan_type, zhengXianHouFangQuDuan_ID, zhengXianQianFangQuDuan_ID, daoChaGuanLianQuDuan1_ID, daoChaGuanLianQuDuan2_ID, dianMaHuaGuiHao, guiNeiDiZhi, yuliu) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zongheId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quduanshejiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quduanyunyingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quduanLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diduanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xianluqingkuang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bianjie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fenjiedianWhere,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhanqufenjie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jinzhanxinhaojiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xinhaojiorbiaozhiming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xinhaobiaozhipaiWhere,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xinhaojiWhere,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zuocejueyuanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{youcejueyuanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhengxianhoufangquduanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhengxianqianfangquduanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daochaguanlianquduan1Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daochaguanlianquduan2Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dianmahuaguihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guineidizhi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yuliu,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, quDuanYunYing_name from mro_quduan_base

SELECT cz.cz_name, xd.xd_name, dwd.dwd_name, qb.* FROM mro_quduan_base qb, mro_xianduan xd, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE qb.cid = cz.cid AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND qb.xid = xd.xid AND line != '电码化' GROUP BY id DESC

SELECT cz.cz_name, xd.xd_name, dwd.dwd_name, qb.* FROM mro_quduan_base qb, mro_xianduan xd, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE qb.cid = cz.cid AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND qb.xid = xd.xid AND line = '电码化' GROUP BY id DESC

SELECT cz.cz_name, dwd.dwd_name, xd.xd_name, qb.* FROM mro_quduan_base qb, mro_xianduan xd, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE qb.cid = cz.cid AND qb.xid = xd.xid AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND line != '电码化' AND qb.cid = #{cid}

SELECT cz.cz_name, xd.xd_name, dwd.dwd_name, qb.* FROM mro_quduan_base qb, mro_xianduan xd, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE qb.cid = cz.cid AND qb.xid = xd.xid AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND line = '电码化' AND qb.cid = #{cid}
SELECT id FROM mro_quduan_base ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

mapper.update:
update mro_quduan_base
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cz_id = #{czid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
xid = #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qdid = #{qdid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
line = #{ofXianDuan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
line = #{line,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
left_right = #{leftRight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xingbie = #{xingBie,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zongHe_id = #{zongheId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quDuanSheJi_name = #{quduanshejiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quDuanYunYing_name = #{quduanyunyingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

carrier = #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

youCeJueYuan_type = #{youcejueyuanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

yuliu = #{yuliu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mro_quduan_base set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xid = #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zongHe_id = #{zongheId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quDuanSheJi_name = #{quduanshejiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quDuanYunYing_name = #{quduanyunyingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quDuan_length = #{quduanLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carrier = #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diDuan_type = #{diduanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xianLuQingKuang = #{xianluqingkuang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bianJie = #{bianjie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fenJieDian_where = #{fenjiedianWhere,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhanQuFenJie = #{zhanqufenjie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jinZhanXinHaoJi_name = #{jinzhanxinhaojiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xinHaoJiOrBiaoZhiMing = #{xinhaojiorbiaozhiming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xinHaoBiaoZhiPai_where = #{xinhaobiaozhipaiWhere,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xinHaoJi_where = #{xinhaojiWhere,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zuoCeJueYuan_type = #{zuocejueyuanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, youCeJueYuan_type = #{youcejueyuanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhengXianHouFangQuDuan_ID = #{zhengxianhoufangquduanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhengXianQianFangQuDuan_ID = #{zhengxianqianfangquduanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daoChaGuanLianQuDuan1_ID = #{daochaguanlianquduan1Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daoChaGuanLianQuDuan2_ID = #{daochaguanlianquduan2Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dianMaHuaGuiHao = #{dianmahuaguihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guiNeiDiZhi = #{guineidizhi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yuliu = #{yuliu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from mro_quduan_base
cz_id= #{czId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and quDuanYunYing_name like concat('%', #{quDuanYunYingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
